attributes.action: Make all English Citizens wear Green Shamrock hats on the 15th March, and make it Irish Public Holiday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make all English Citizens wear Green Shamrock hats on the 15th March, and make it Irish Public Holiday. We think that Ireland deserves this owing to the major contibutions (eg W B Yeats) to the structure of Britain.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
